channel.title: Forums?
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
With your uber forums that are so great, why not make a tutorial on how to create\make good forums. I honestly (and hopefuly I'm not alone) have no darn clue how to use this downloaded vbulletin crap, nor how to use it for the forum. If anyone could create a tutorial, that'd be appreciated.
(I'm not sure if this is the right topic to post in or not, but hopefully it is, their isn't anyone request tus for non-scar related things.)
I wish to create some good forums for me & my friends at school.
